name: Ghosts & Catacombs
description:
G&C is a rogue-like game where you explore a randomly generated map with a large number of ghosts.

The aim of the game is to kill ghosts to  get gold, get gold to upgrade spells to kill more ghosts.  The more ghosts you kill, the more points, however, it also increases the chance of coming across stronger ghosts.

This is a really difficult game, so you can brag to your friends and challenge them to beat your high score.

I hope you enjoy it :-D
